name: Rockport Golf Solitaire
description:
A game of golf solitaire. The goal is to remove all cards from the table. You can place a card on top of a card in the foundation if the card is bigger or smaller by one. Tap on a card you want to send up to the foundation, or tap on the deck to change the foundation card.
Some of the game features are:
• Easy gameplay which requires thinking ahead.
• tutorial.
• hints.
